p: The 2019 novel coronavirus (SARS-CoV-2) is a new human coronavirus which emerged at the end of December 2019 in Wuhan, China. It is currently spreading with epidemic features in China and other Asian countries, and cases have been reported in Europe, Australia and North America. Currently (as of 8th March 2020) 105Â 586 confirmed cases have been reported in 101 countries, with a total of 3584 deaths [ 1].
